website_summaries.verdict: Cute feminine ankle height boot for kids available in multiple colors.
pros: Boot back is adorned with bows that add a bit of personality
The boot also features a very soft interior lining
The pink version is very bright and the boot fits well
Cute design provides warmth for colder days
cons: Fit is a little tight, some may need to go up a size

customer_reviews.title: Great Ugg quality
customer_reviews.text: These are for my daughter size women’s 6. Saved $ ordering child size. Great Ugg quality. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing uggs for years and these are by far my favorite. Actually helped my plantar fasciitis since anything with arch support just made it worse. I live in these! Very happy with this purchase! Really cute too!
customer_reviews.author: LilSnowflake

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: My biggest worry about ordering from online is if my items will be authentic because of so many fakes out there. This item was legit and came in 2 days nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic swasey

customer_reviews.title: we get these every year and are perfect for the cold months
customer_reviews.text: we get these every year and are perfect for the cold months. the piping around the front though is usually the part that always gets muffled the most. could be the way my daughter walks but gets us every time.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They fit a little snug with the fur but keep my daughters feet nice and warm. These are absolutely adorable! We get lots of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Haley c.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! My daughter loved them. Fit well (according to her normal shoe size). We did spray them with suede protector bc many peoples looked ruined from getting wet. Hers still look brand new (one month in).
customer_reviews.author: Drew Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for active children
customer_reviews.text: We get our granddaughter a pair of UGGs for her birthday every year and we're never dissatisfied. She's 4 and incredibly hard on shoes, but UGGs are rugged enough to take it and they look great with her jeans, leggings and denim dresses.
customer_reviews.author: PammyK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very wide foot and the “big kids” size 6 is great. I might be able to wear a 5 but I am very happy with this purchase. A ladies size 6 or 7 are too narrow. I am a 70 yaar old woman and thought these might be too young for me but my daughter says they look good. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: review girl

customer_reviews.title: would buy again if they had another color
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft in the inside, and comfy. I’m a size 7 do I ordered a kids size 5 they fit great if I order another pair ide try a 4 just so they are more tight fitting but other then that I love.....
customer_reviews.author: Instagram: @acrystal_bar

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early!
customer_reviews.text: Uggs are a good brand, so no surprises in the quality. Price was comparable to all other retailers selling the same style (Bailey Bow Big kid's size 6). I will say they arrived earlier than expected though!
customer_reviews.author: D&D

customer_reviews.title: She told me she just love them. Thanks for making her happy also the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my Granddaughter for Christmas. My daughter said she wears them all the time. She told me she just love them. Thanks for making her happy also the price was cheaper than other places I looked. Amazon always have the better deals and for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Willie A Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear kids sizes, so I shop kids Uggs- I get colors the adult sizes don't have and I save a little money. These are great- purple!!!- and I wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Tolf

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits just right, real Ugg’s comes with authenticity tags. Very cute. I wear I women’s 7 and these fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Laiya

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots for my grand daughter i would purchase these again they was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: shauntell1971

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Boot came with the front of the boot ripped open, had to return for a full refund. Not sure how this could even happen, its as if there is no inspection or quality control in place. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Everything one expects from UGG. Great quality, kid loves them. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sjlgray

customer_reviews.title: If you wear a women’s size up to 8, buy these and save $50
customer_reviews.text: I’m a women’s size 7 so I bought these in a kids size 5 and a women’s size 7 to compare, the only difference was the height of the women’s boot was 1/2 inch taller, everything else was the same so I went with the kid’s size and saved $50.
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my Granddaughter and she loved them! UGG quality is always excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Fit to sizing in ad. Well made. Grand daughter luv's them. She got two pair (black/beige) and wears them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Rich from Long Island

customer_reviews.title: You tween will love!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves loves love them! Like Mommy’s and older sister was jealous of her 11 year old sister!
customer_reviews.author: Nana23a

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! I wanted matching boots for all of my granddaughters! And , the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: SERENA

customer_reviews.title: WOW 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loves them! They are comfortable and well designed. They look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Fit as expected and very stylish and very warm. You will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy  again. True to size..comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my granddaughter..she Love them.fits true to size..she loves her UGGS...
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Uggs always run Small
customer_reviews.text: I knew to get a little bigger. Daughter is super happy and wears them everywhere. Super comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Fafary

customer_reviews.title: Cute as hell
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful i absolutely love them...brought to match a pink coat i love them so much😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Maino35

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my 10 year okd niece. She loves the color & the boots.
customer_reviews.author: eot

customer_reviews.title: Just got this shoe for my daughter and she wore ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this shoe for my daughter and she wore it for few hours and sole already started to detach from the shoe and the cotton rim in the from started to rip , did not expect this from such an expensive shoe. I am returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: nisara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfortable, my daughter does not take them off, loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Maya's

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves these so much! She doesn’t like to take them off
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sweemore

customer_reviews.title: Great Uggs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and she totally loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and received so many compliments already!! Quick shipping and for great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Boot
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable boots and wonderfully warm for winter. We have received many compliments on them. They are pricey but worth the money because of the high quality. They will keep my daughter's feet warm this Chicago winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Snug to start. Then just right.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. Snug to start. Fit perfectly after just a couple wears.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Love these cute boots!!
customer_reviews.text: The fit & style are great! So warm & comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Iacono

customer_reviews.title: Loved the classic look with a twist
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fashionable bows add a nice look to tbe classic ugg look.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy torres

customer_reviews.title: The price and how well their made!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these boot! Will order another pair for my grandchildren... Love the color,excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got for granddaughter for X-mas! She loved so all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my little daughter, love it! Keeps her feet warm at all times
customer_reviews.author: Alen Hurem

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit true to size. My daughter normally wears a toddler 10 so i bought the 10. She has a little room to grow and wear a thicker sock if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Skyesmommi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these as a Christmas gift and absolutely loves them! Fits true to size
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just as pictured and authentic. Fast and reliable shipping.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Defective Boot
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter's toe went through top of toe of boot after one month of wear
customer_reviews.author: carolyn taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is just in love with these ugg boots! She loves them so much they are so warm inside and keep your feet warm. This is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfy
customer_reviews.text: this is a staple item in my wardrobe. I was just getting new ones
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter loves to wear them. Very warm, soft, and fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Efren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Quick shipping - perfect description. Thank you for an easy transaction.
customer_reviews.author: K. COLEGrOVE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love the style of the boot. They size run large. We had to go down 1 size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 in womens, and they fit perfectly. They are so warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline H.

customer_reviews.title: Ugg Boots
customer_reviews.text: The fur is not soft like if your purchasing in store.
customer_reviews.author: David Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart a little confusing
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars if the US to European sizing conversion chart was not so confusing. Other than that, I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing. Uggs are
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Thanks for quickly delivery. It was amazing. Uggs are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome uggs as always but run smal compared to the side Velcro they have for baby uggs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' Bailey Bow II Boot
product_meta.description: Built to move The way kids do, Each boot features a rocker-bottom shape for a barefoot feel and our super-lightweight outsole for traction and durability. Plus, it's pretreated to protect against water and staining for all the dirt, puddles, and ketchup out there.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-calf from arch
Pretreated to repel water and stains
Cushioning foam insole lined with 17mm UGGpure wool
